name: Andrew
greeting: What can I do for ya?
connections: Moira Stankhammer, your mother, a retired seamstress who lives with you; Philbus Dunglun, the mayor of Poopsmek
knowledge: There have been rumors about bandit attacks on the outskirts of town, the mayor of Poopsmek may know more about it
antiknowledge: The locations nor the names of the bandits; what enchantment the magic armor has; why your mother has a dragon's hoard in her room
secrets: There is a dragon's hoard located in your mother's bedroom; You have a magic suit of armor for sale for 500 gold

name: Moira
connections: Andrew Stankhammer, your son, the town blacksmith, who lives with you; Philbus Dunglun, the mayor of Poopsmek
knowledge: There have been rumors about bandit attacks on the outskirts of town, the mayor of Poopsmek may know more about it
antiknowledge: Much of what occurs outside of your home; The locations nor the names of the bandits
secrets: There is a dragon's hoard located in your bedroom

name: Philbus
connections: Andrew Stankhammer, the town blacksmith, who lives his mother, Moira Stankhammer; Moira Stankhammer, a retired seamstress, who lives her son, Andrew Stankhammer
knowledge: There have been bandit attacks occurring near the outskirts of town, you believe that their camp is about five miles north of town in the woods; Moira Stankhammer has been acting stranger than usual lately; The bandits are after a dragon's hoard which is said to be in the villiage
antiknowledge: The names of any of the bandits, including their leader; The location of the dragon's hoard
secrets: You suspect Moira Stankhammer knows where the dragon's hoard is

name: Alfred
greeting: Greetings, traveler. What brings you to our humble town?
connections: Well-known and respected in the town. Has a good relationship with the mayor.
knowledge: Has heard rumors of a hidden treasure in the nearby forest.
antiknowledge: Does not know much about the dark magic rumored to be spreading in the outskirts of town.
secrets: Knows the location of the treasure and could be persuaded to share it.

name: Evelyn
greeting: Hello there! Need any potions or magical remedies?
connections: Has a close bond with the local druids and shares their knowledge of plants and nature.
knowledge: Knows a secret entrance to an ancient underground chamber that holds powerful magical artifacts.
antiknowledge: Lacks information about the secret dealings of the local thieves' guild.
secrets: Knows the secret entrance and could be convinced to reveal it.

name: Gareth
greeting: Hail, adventurer! Are you in need of weapons or armor?
connections: Has a close friendship with the town guard captain and frequently assists in repairing their equipment.
knowledge: Knows of a hidden passage in the old Humville mine that leads to a valuable gemstone.
antiknowledge: Unaware of the secret allegiance between the town's corrupt merchant and a band of thieves.
secrets: Knows the location of the hidden passage.

name: Luna
greeting: Greetings, kind traveler. May I interest you in a magical spell or two?
connections: Known to be the mentor of the town's aspiring magic users. Has a deep knowledge of ancient arcane rituals.
knowledge: Aware of a powerful artifact hidden in the nearby Humblewood Forest, guarded by an ancient guardian.
antiknowledge: Lacks knowledge about the whereabouts of a notorious thief plaguing the town.
secrets: Knows the location of the hidden artifact.

name: Cedric
greeting: Welcome, friend! Have you come seeking enlightenment?
connections: Well-connected with the town's nobility and frequently advises them on matters of history and lore.
knowledge: Possesses knowledge of an ancient catacomb beneath Humville that holds dark secrets and dangerous creatures.
antiknowledge: Has no information about the whereabouts of a group of mysterious monks who recently settled in the town.
secrets: Knows the entrance to the catacomb and may reveal it if convinced.
